features: Silverware Set For 4 - Each Package includes 4 knives, 4 soup spoons, 4 teaspoons, 4 salad forks, 4 dinner forks. This silverware set is great for everyday use and also for a special dinner. Essential for families or restaurants.
Smooth & Sturdy - Multiple times of fine polishing gives KingStone cutlery set elegant fine mirror finish, smooth and no rough edges. Simple yet classic, appealing to the eye.

18/10 Stainless Steel & Comfortable - Our flatware sets are made of decent quality 18/10 stainless steel, nice balanced, sturdy and corrosion resistant. Thickened handles are comfortable to grip and not easy to bend.

Easy to Clean & Zero Waste - Mirror Polished Surface and Streamline Body Molding makes the Kitchen utensils easy to clean. Flatware is designed to last, so that you'll never have to reach for the single-use plastic again!

This shiny silver flatware set is perfect for Thanksgiving Day, Mother's Day, Housewarming, Wedding, Restaurant, Hotel or Daily Use. Simple classic modern design would match well with your existing cutlery and elevate everyday meals into a fine dining experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Give your festival table setting more flavor KINGSTONE Silverware Set is made of high quality 18/10 stainless steel, which makes it sturdy, corrosion- and rust resistant and nice balanced. Will not produce residues or odors like other materials.6 times of extreme heating and cooling was deployed to maximize KingStone's strength and formability.Multiple times of fine polishing gives the cutlery set not only elegant fine mirror finish, but also smoothly finished edges.The silverware set has the right weight and length, provides a good grasp for both adults and older children.Ideal for family daily use, parties, gatherings, family dinners, candlelight dinner, banquet, Thanksgiving, BBQ, wedding and other formal occasions. Also apply to apartment, cabin, home, camping, hotel, restaurant, eatery, bistro, etc or when you need extra flatware set.

Minimalist design for your unique style Mirror Polishing Spoons are versatile in use even on their own, professional spoon bowl and handle design, very smooth surface, no sharp edges or rough points, will never hurt your mouth when used. Solid & Durable Solid constructed by quality stainless steel.Inside edges of the forks are well finished with no sharp edges.The front tines make it easy to pick up different foods without cutting your mouth. Comfortable to Hold Slim but heavy enough, comfortable to grip;The simplest design, without any decorative sharp edges to poke the hand in use.One solid piece of silver stainless steel with no joint.
Classic Flatware Set, Multiple Occasions Home Daily Use Wedding Party Restaurant

Hold The Cutlery In Your Hand, Become A Fan Of Our Brand Know More about KINGSTONE How much can you know about the flatware or how much difference can you feel if you just look at a few pictures or videos. Why the flatware sets look similar but quite different in daily use? Here are some points that why Kingstone silverware is special. 1. Product material: Kingstone Cutlery only uses 18/10 stainless steel. There are many types of stainless steel, but we only use first-hand 18/10 raw materials for ours, never use second-hand or falsely labeled materials. hold the cutlery in your hand, you will know the difference of our brand. 2. Top craftsmanship: The craftsmanship is the soul of the silverware sets product. The level of forging and polishing technology are cutting-edge, which determines the service life of your product and whether it can maintain its long-term luster and feel. Some products look the same gloss initially, but you can see the difference after 3-5 months daily use. 3. Design and R&D capabilities: Tableware may seem simple, but the simpler the thing, the higher the design level is. Kingstone has brought together multiple international design teams, The different design elements corresponds to different usage scenarios and groups of people. There is always one Kingstone cutlery sets fit for your need. 4. Trusted brand. Kingstone Group has strong production capacity and has long-term cooperative relationships with many internationally named brands and supermarkets. You can always trust the brand that other famous brands trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very simple and elegant. Looks and feels expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking flatware
reviews.reviewText: A long time ago we bought a set of 'Data' silverware from Ikea and liked the clean look. Those are no longer being made and we've had kids since then, so many of the pieces have mysteriously disappeared. These seemed close design-wise so I ordered the set. They are sturdy with some heft, look good, and seem like a good value for the price. One caution: knives are VERY SHARP for a tableware set -- this is actually a positive but be careful when you first take them out of the package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We gifted this to our friends. It seemed like great quality and weight to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good for the price
reviews.reviewText: look the clean look. nice and heavy. worried they may scratch up (i got black) so i will see how they hold up. the smaller forks are pretty tiny, this is the only thing i really didn’t like about this silverware set. the big fork is the size of a regular fork, they should honestly just have the big size and forget about the small one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best silverware I’ve ever used!
reviews.reviewText: Love these. Look good and feel great to use. Can’t recommend enough. Can’t go back to old school crappy silverware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: these are just perfect! They look nice, they function well, they clean easily---what's not to like?

reviews.reviewerName: Love the flatware especially the Hostess set!
